build.description: Builds the project in both ES Module and CommonJS formats

build:esm.description: Builds the project in ES Module format
build:esm.command: deno run -A npm:typescript/tsc src/mod.ts --declaration --rewriteRelativeImportExtensions --target es2022 --module es2022 --outDir ./dist/esm

build:cjs.description: Builds the project in CommonJS format
build:cjs.command: deno run -A npm:typescript/tsc src/mod.ts --declaration --rewriteRelativeImportExtensions --target es2022 --module commonjs --outDir ./dist/cjs
